posts.author: HomebrewHero
posts.content:
We had a hilarious situation where our Bard tried to use Best to negotiate with a dragon. It went exactly as you'd expect!

In the new 2024 rules update, they changed how Best works. Now it's more streamlined but I'm not sure if it's better overall.

I think the 2024 changes to Best make it much more balanced compared to before.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about Best. Based on my experience, it works differently.
